column5: Derp
"Rollin in my 5.0 with the rag top down so my hair can blow" meh.
So you're telling me "far out' and "fab" are no longer in? Time to put my paisley guru shirt away I guess

this post is so "sick" ... Lew.. you're the man... not afraid to ask the tough questions... the rest of us.... just sitting back like we know? what's knowing on....  My son posts on facebook... I have NO idea what he's saying...?!
lew gone are the days of carhops,baby moons. being a preppy or a greaser. these young bucks would never understand our lingo either lol.
What the heck do the words mang and meh stand for ??  I keep seeing them but have no clue.  Forgive my dumbness, but I'm old
mang is slang for 'Man'...  Like 'What up mang?'..  ala Tony Montana  Meh is like whatever, etc...

LOL..  no worries Lew..and I may be wrong as well.. but mang.. to me means "man"  kinda slang, like whey hows it going mang??  and meh... means "whatever" in a blah tone... like "hey hows your day going?" ... "meh"  (lol.. hear that one form the kids, )
dammit bill ya beat me... but at least i know im right!!!

I think "meh" is something people say when the don't care or are unimpressed with something they've seen or heard.  "Mang" is "man"...as is "What's up, mang?"......but the "joke" is that the speaker has a latino accent, like Tony Montana from Scarface.    Opps....too late.
I always new what they meant Lew but I'll bite my lip on what I think of it...........
well I hope it doesn`t catch on here !!!
LOL..  says the old guy... hahahha every generation has its slang!!
meh...
DOH

Thanks guys, it's a bugger to get old(er)  A few years back I had a real nice set of chrome wheels on my truck. I stopped at a red light and a kid on the sidewalk said "heyyyy mannnn, those wheels are sick"  I thought he was insulting me until I learned the truth
Hahaha, yup, sick is the new cool!
and don't forget meh's companion...feh (kinda like meh but harsher..like when your kid says 'please' in that dismissive tone)
I think it was this man who started the 'meh' craze
Wicked!!
dont worry Lew its still groovy daddyoh
Yeah, just hang tough and it'll be all clear!
Chico and the Man.... Looooking good mang!
Good ol' Lenny. Everybody loves Lenny.
ahahaha, You are right about that! At least that's where I got it from... aha
LOL !!! I agree.... if your name isn't Tony Montana, you shouldn't be using either !!!
Follow if you can Lew.LOL
I lost it after low sperm count......
Now ya gots it Lew.  Word to your mother!
